books.title: The Autobiography of Calvin Coolidge
books.author: Calvin Coolidge
books.summary: The thirtieth president of the United States recounts his life story.

books.title: The Four Just Men
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: To prevent the passage of a controversial government bill, four vigilantes take the law into their own hands.

books.title: Narrative of the Life of Frederick Douglass
books.author: Frederick Douglass
books.summary: Frederick Douglass describes his youth as a slave in Maryland and his desire to be a free man.

books.title: Tombstone
books.author: Walter Noble Burns
books.summary: An embellished retelling of the town of Tombstone, Arizona, during its heyday in the late 19th century, featuring famous heroes and outlaws of the American Old West.

books.title: The Phoenix and the Carpet
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Five children once again encounter an ancient, magical creature and go on adventures around the world with its magic carpet.

books.title: Brewster’s Millions
books.author: George Barr McCutcheon
books.summary: A young man stands to gain a fortune—but only if he loses one first.

books.title: Antony and Cleopatra
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: Mark Antony, a Roman triumvir, and Cleopatra, the Queen of Egypt, become embroiled in a deadly love affair.

books.title: The Gods of Pegāna
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A mysterious god creates a cosmic pantheon to rule over its worlds and time.

books.title: Scarlet Sister Mary
books.author: Julia Peterkin
books.summary: A young woman struggles to choose between living as a member in good standing in the church or embracing a life of sin and pleasure.

books.title: At the Mountains of Madness
books.author: H. P. Lovecraft
books.summary: An Antarctic expedition reveals the horrifying reality of ancient myths in the depths of the continent.

books.title: Travel Essays
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: A collection of Robert Louis Stevenson’s travel essays.

books.title: The Canary Murder Case
books.author: S. S. Van Dine
books.summary: A Manhattan art connoisseur turned amateur detective gets involved in a murder investigation when a theatrical starlet is found dead in her apartment.

books.title: The Everlasting Man
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: G. K. Chesterton takes us through the history of man, rebuking common secular views and presenting the case for the Catholic Church.

books.title: The Problems of Philosophy
books.author: Bertrand Russell
books.summary: A beginner’s guide to problems in various fields of philosophy.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Ring Lardner
books.summary: A collection of poems by Ring Lardner.

books.title: The Importance of Being Earnest
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A comedy skewering Victorian high society.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Algis Budrys
books.summary: Science fiction short stories by author Algis Budrys.

books.title: Poirot Investigates
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: A calculating Belgian detective and his wide-eyed companion investigate and solve a series of mysteries.

books.title: The Imitation of Christ
books.author: Thomas à Kempis
books.summary: Thomas à Kempis provides instructions for a Christian spiritual life.

books.title: To Cuba and Back
books.author: Richard Henry Dana Jr.
books.summary: A captivating travel memoir recounting an 1859 journey to Cuba, offering vivid descriptions of the island’s culture, landscapes, and people.
